execution_quality: Efficient and direct; agent made targeted edits to relevant files with minimal overhead, completing the requested adjustments in under a minute.
work_category: Dependency version management - user reported Flutter SDK version recommendation and agent appears to have updated configuration files accordingly.
summary: Agent quickly responded to a Flutter SDK version update by making edits to project files. While the execution was efficient and focused, the vague initial request ('it recommended flutter sdk 3.38.7') and absence of explicit confirmation leaves some uncertainty about whether the intended task was fully completed or if user simply moved on. The one-shot execution and lack of errors suggests the agent understood the intent, but clarity could have been improved.
follow_up_pattern: Session ended without follow-up, suggesting either task completion or user moving on to next activity. Empty message indicates no immediate clarification needed.
